alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Blaine; Custer; Hooker; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; Loup; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:16AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Arthur, northwestern Loup, northeastern Keith, southeastern Hooker, northwestern Lincoln, Logan, McPherson, northwestern Custer, Blaine and Thomas Counties through 500 AM CDT/400 AM MDT/... At 415 AM CDT/315 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Purdum to near Keystone. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stapleton, Thedford, Brewster, Tryon, Anselmo, Dunning, Halsey, Gandy, Purdum, Ringgold, Lemoyne, Logan, Milburn, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Fox Bayou, Almeria Meadow State Wildlife Management Area, Hawley Flats, Tarboz Lake and Shanklin Bluff. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 138 and 147. Highway 2 between mile markers 213 and 258. Highway 61 between mile markers 98 and 107. Highway 92 between mile markers 130 and 138, and between mile markers 184 and 245. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 45. Highway 83 between mile markers 88 and 150. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Blaine; Custer; Hooker; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; Loup; McPherson; Thomas
